description:
This is a course to help any individual who is committed to quit smoking. The course explains some of the key concepts (Removing pain and Gaining pleasure) of life and the reasons behind how and why we do things. This concept will enable you to unlock the blocks in your path of becoming a non-smoker. This concept can be used in removing any obstacle in other areas of your life.

The course also offer some techniques you can try without using hypnosis and this could be useful for light smokers. These techinques could be used in combination with each other or you may choose some which may be easier for you to follow. If these techniques are used in conjunction with hypnotherapy recording, it will give you the best results especially if you are a heavy smoker.
title: Become a Non-Smoker using Hypnosis
